ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:35}); // {Cloud}
“H, hey! What is it?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:37}); // {Cloud}
“Turks!
Must be a trap…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:43}); // {Tifa}
“I hope {Aeris} is all right.”
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:8, type:2, adjust:0});

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:40}); // {Barret}
“This is the real thing.
Don't let your guard down.”
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:8, type:2, adjust:0});

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:36}); // Rude
“Would you press 'Up' please?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:38}); // Tseng
“This must've been a real thrill for you…
Did you enjoy it?”
createLineTrigger({x1:-77, y1:0, z1:-1, x2:73, y2:73, z2:-1});

dialogStrings:
You cannot take on any more Materia.
Please discard some Materia.

[Save Point]
Access the Menu and select
{PURPLE}[SAVE]{WHITE} to save your game.
You don't have a Card Key

Tseng
“This must've been a real thrill for you…
Did you enjoy it?”

{Barret}
“This is the real thing.
Don't let your guard down.”

{Cloud}
“…I don't know.
Now that you mention it,
this's my first time at headquarters.
What about you?”

{Barret}
“…I been here before.
Back when I still had both my hands.”

{Tifa}
“{Aeris}…
“{Aeris}…
She's been through a lot, huh.”{PAUSE} Yeah
You too, {Tifa}

{Barret}
“You'll be okay soon. You've been
asleep a long time.”

{Barret}
“Don't worry.
I don't know what happened
to {Cloud} either.”

{Barret}
“Guess I shouldn't tell you not to worry…”

{Barret}
“They don't know if he's alright either.”

{Barret}
“Let's see now…
Must've been about 7 days.”

{Barret}
“It ain't over yet.
Remember that huge light,
in the Northern Cave?”

{Barret}
“Well now the crater's surrounded
by a huge light barrier.”{PAUSE}“Everyone knows Sephiroth sleeps in there
protected by the barrier.”{PAUSE}“We can't do a damn thing about it.
We just gotta wait till he wakes up.”

{Barret}
“On top of that, some huge monster called
Weapon's been on the rampage.”

{Barret}
“Remember that huge monster
with Sephiroth, at
the bottom of the crater?”{PAUSE}“Well it's up here now.
They say it's some legendary
monster from the past.”

{Barret}
“Dunno.
But he's been goin' around tearin' stuff up.”{PAUSE}“Right now that Rufus is fightin' it.
I hate to admit it, but he's got guts.”

{Barret}
“We shoulda been the ones to destroy it,
but there ain't no time…”

Rufus
“I thought {Cloud} would show up
to save you all…”{PAUSE}“Professor Hojo wanted to check up
on {Cloud}, too.”

{Tifa}
“What are you going
to do to {Cloud}?”

Rufus
“Meteor has been summoned…
Essentially, it's all but over now.”

Rufus
“So, there's no need for you now.”

Rufus
“No, maybe there is an important task for you…”

Heidegger
“President!
Preparations for the public
execution are complete.”

{Barret}
“Execution!?”{PAUSE}“What're ya gonna get by executin' us?”

Rufus
“You are to be executed for causing this
situation.”{PAUSE}“People are ignorant.
They'll feel better as long as
someone is punished.”

{Barret}
“I take back the good things I said
'bout this damn jackass!”

Rufus
“Well, enjoy your last moments together.”

Scarlet
“Is everyone here?
These are the ones who brought this
madness to the world!”

Scarlet
“We will be broadcasting your miserable
deaths live on national television.”

“Scarlet, why a public execution
in this day and age?”

Scarlet
“With the chaos resulting from the Meteor
reports, we desperately need to rally
public support…
it's better that we punish
somebody, anybody.”

Scarlet
“Ha, ha, ha, ha !”{PAUSE}“They'll never admit it,
but everyone loves this stuff!”

{Barret}
“If you've gotta do it…take me first!”

Scarlet
“Camera, this way!
Make sure you get this, the audience
just eats up tearful goodbyes!”

Scarlet
“This is my special gas chamber.
Take your time and enjoy
a slow painful death.”

Scarlet
“What'd you do?
Hey! Open it!”

{Tifa}
“First you lock me in this weird place,
and now you're telling me to come out?
Make up your mind!”

Scarlet
“Don't make me pry it open!”

{Barret}
“Hold your breath!
Hold on as long as you can!”

{Tifa}
“Come on!
I can't hold on forever!”

Move your feet and arms, then use your
head to get out of the chair.

Try different patterns.
Try and combine two movements at once.

Scarlet
“Well now, the show's about to begin.
Ha, ha, ha !”

“Emergency! Emergency!”{PAUSE}“Weapon's approaching! Attention all
military personnel: take your positions!”

Scarlet
“Hmm, so you didn't run?
I'm impressed. How do I feel?
Right now…”

{Barret}
“Why you…
Ain't you part of Shinra?”

{Cait Sith}
“Let's just say I'm against capital punishment.
Besides…I hate this broad.
Come on, we gotta help {Tifa}.”

{Cait Sith}
“I'll keep watch at the entrance.”

{Barret}
“The Gas Room's probably locked from a
different room!”

{Cait Sith}
“Hmm, we gotta go with a different plan.
Let's get out of this room first.”

Scarlet
“…Fools…
I've already pushed
the switch…”

{Cait Sith}
“Where you goin'?
The airport's the other way.”

Scarlet
“Fools.
Now, you can't save the girl.”

{Cait Sith}
“OK, OK time for Plan B.
Let's run to the airport!”

{Cait Sith}
“Trust me, trust me.
We gotta take a chance.”

“I know you're in a hurry!
But, may have a word…”

“Don't make so much noise.
It's me, ME! {Yuffie}!”

{Yuffie}
“I'll explain later!
Now we gotta get to the airport!”

Rufus
“There's been so many attacks
lately. Can we handle it?”

Heidegger
“We'll give it a shot from our big cannon.”

Heidegger
“Open cannon doors!!
Activate cannon. Target: Weapon!!”

Heidegger
“It can't be! We hit it dead on!”

Rufus
“Then use regular fire power in the meantime!”

Heidegger
“Yes sir! Open all artillery doors!
Target: Weapon! Don't let it land!”
